Translations.Text: vela assuredly it bol guide zlutovanie believers
Tvoj Lord bol Jeden kto judges them v accordance s Jeho rules He bol Almighty Omniscient
Therefore put tvoj trust GOD ona nasledovat manifest truth
Ona nie robit dead nor deaf hear vola sa they turn
Nor mozem ona guide blind ich straying Iba jeden hear ona bol those verit v our revelations decide bol submitters
Do ihned cas my produce them creature robit earthly latka declaring lenze ludia nie bol certain about our revelations
Dni pojdem when my zvolat kazdy obec some z those nie verit v our proofs forcibly
When they arrive He say Ona zamietnut Moj revelations acquiring znalost them! this nie co ona je robit
They incur requital ich wickedness; they say nothing
they nie seen my Have robit night ich zvysok dni lighted? These je sufficient proofs ludia verit
Dni when roh blown everyone heavens zem horrified except those zvolit si GOD All will pojdem Him forcibly
When ona look mountains ona myslienka they standing still Lenze they moving mat rad clouds Such je zhotovit GOD zdokonalit everything. He je fully Cognizant z everything ona robit
